alert.note: Alert for Grundy (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 10:39PM CDT until July 28 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grundy County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1038 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hinckley to Serena to near Oglesby, moving east-southeast 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morris, Channahon, Minooka, Braidwood, Coal City, Dwight, Diamond, Gardner, Mazon, Braceville, South Wilmington, Godley, Carbon Hill, Verona, East Brooklyn and Kinsman. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 219 and 233. I-80 between mile markers 104 and 120. This includes... Gebhard Woods State Park, Grundy County Speedway and Fairgrounds, and William G Stratton State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
